Title: Begin Again
Overview: Gretta, a budding songwriter, finds herself alone after her boyfriend Dave ditches her. Her life gains purpose when Dan, a record label executive, notices her talent.
Tagline: You're only as strong as your next move.
production_companies: Likely Story, Apatow Productions, Exclusive Media Group, Sycamore Pictures
Cast: Mark Ruffalo, Keira Knightley, Adam Levine
clean_text: begin gretta bud songwriter find boyfriend dave ditch life gain purpose dan record label executive notice talent strong comedy music romance drama john carney mark ruffalo keira knightley adam levine 2013
